survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Smart Home Energy Management Systems Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of smart home energy management systems to evaluate satisfaction levels, identify pain points, and uncover opportunities for improvement in energy efficiency and user experience.

questions.question_text: How long have you been using a smart home energy management system?
